name: UIAccessibilityCustomRotor
desc: A context-sensitive function that helps VoiceOver users find the next instance of a related element.

items.name: init(attributedName: NSAttributedString, itemSearch: UIAccessibilityCustomRotor.Search)
items.desc: Creates a rotor with the specified name and search block.

items.name: init(name: String, itemSearch: UIAccessibilityCustomRotor.Search)
items.desc: Creates a rotor with the specified name and search block.

items.name: init(systemType: UIAccessibilityCustomRotor.SystemRotorType, itemSearch: UIAccessibilityCustomRotor.Search)
items.desc: Creates a rotor for the specified type of item.

items.name: var itemSearchBlock: UIAccessibilityCustomRotor.Search
items.desc: The block for retrieving the next or previous rotor.

items.name: typealias UIAccessibilityCustomRotor.Search
items.desc: The block type for retrieving the next or previous rotor.

items.name: enum UIAccessibilityCustomRotor.Direction
items.desc: Constants that indicate the search direction.

items.name: var systemRotorType: UIAccessibilityCustomRotor.SystemRotorType
items.desc: The type of content that the rotor searches.

items.name: enum UIAccessibilityCustomRotor.SystemRotorType
items.desc: Constants that indicate the type of content that the rotor represents.

items.name: var attributedName: NSAttributedString
items.desc: The name of the rotor as an attributed string.
